forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 16C. S winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Flooding possible in poor drainage areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 61F. S winds at 15 to 25 mph, increasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Flooding possible in poor drainage areas.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Flooding possible in poor drainage areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 53F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Flooding possible in poor drainage areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 19C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 67F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
